fact_check_explanation_title: No, contact tracing doesn’t cost £10,000 per contact
fact_check_explanation_summary: The claim made by Independent SAGE is based on the £12 billion cost of the test and trace programme, which is mostly testing not tracing.

fact_check_explanation_title: The Covid-19 recovery rate is not 99.9%
fact_check_explanation_summary: Posts on social media have overestimated the Covid recovery rate.

fact_check_explanation_title: There’s no evidence that mercury-based chemicals in a Covid-19 vaccine would cause harm
fact_check_explanation_summary: Thiomersal is no longer found in most standard vaccines and even if it was used in a Covid-19 vaccine there is no evidence it causes harm.

fact_check_explanation_title: How accurate are the new rapid lateral flow tests?
fact_check_explanation_summary: New trial results show rapid lateral flow tests return very few false positives but a considerable number of false negatives.

fact_check_explanation_title: New data doesn’t definitively show zero increase in suicides across England
fact_check_explanation_summary: Early figures from a few areas of England on suicides since the pandemic began may not represent the whole country.

fact_check_explanation_title: No evidence aluminium in vaccines causes Alzheimer's disease
fact_check_explanation_summary: Small amounts of aluminium have been used in vaccines for almost 100 years.

fact_check_explanation_title: The government is not proposing to make a Covid-19 vaccine mandatory
fact_check_explanation_summary: Evidence submitted to the human rights committee by four academics has been misunderstood.

fact_check_explanation_title: The Covid-19 virus has been isolated many times
fact_check_explanation_summary: Claims that the Covid-19 virus has not been isolated, and therefore tests for it do not work, are unfounded.

fact_check_explanation_title: Viral letter on Covid-19 testing in Liverpool school was real but has been withdrawn
fact_check_explanation_summary: The letter was sent without input from the council. A new letter issued to parents asks for consent to test children.

fact_check_explanation_title: Group swab Covid-19 tests do not return positives to people without the virus
fact_check_explanation_summary: Sample pooling is a method being trialled to save time and resources when Covid-19 prevalence is low.

fact_check_explanation_title: Express opinion piece wrong to allege evidence of widespread voter fraud in US elections
fact_check_explanation_summary: A comment piece in the Express wrongly claimed Donald Trump lost the election because of fraudulent votes.

fact_check_explanation_title: Labour MP contact tracing claim at PMQs out by factor of ten
fact_check_explanation_summary: Ruth Jones claimed the contact tracing system in England costs £1,700 per person. This was based on a calculation which was out by a factor of ten.
